org.apache.taverna.platform.execution.impl.local

Class LocalExecutionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.platform.execution.api.AbstractExecutionService
      • org.apache.taverna.platform.execution.impl.local.LocalExecutionService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionService, WorkflowCompiler

    public class LocalExecutionService
extends AbstractExecutionService
implements WorkflowCompiler
    Service for executing Taverna workflows on a local Taverna Dataflow Engine.
    Author:
    David Withers

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalExecutionService()
      Constructs an execution service that executes workflows using the T2 dataflow engine.

      • createExecutionImpl

        protected Execution createExecutionImpl(WorkflowBundle workflowBundle,
                                        Workflow workflow,
                                        Profile profile,
                                        Bundle dataBundle)
                                 throws InvalidWorkflowException
        Description copied from class: AbstractExecutionService
        Creates an implementation of an Execution. To be implemented by concrete implementations of ExecutionService.
        Specified by:
        createExecutionImpl in class AbstractExecutionService
        Parameters:
        workflowBundle - the WorkflowBundle containing the Workflows required for execution
        workflow - the Workflow to execute
        profile - the Profile to use when executing the Workflow
        dataBundle - the Bundle containing the data values for the Workflow
        Returns:
        a new Execution implementation
        Throws:
        InvalidWorkflowException - if the specified workflow is invalid

      • getDataflow

        public Dataflow getDataflow(Workflow workflow)
                     throws InvalidWorkflowException
        Description copied from interface: WorkflowCompiler
        Convert a workflow into a dataflow. May cache.
        Specified by:
        getDataflow in interface WorkflowCompiler
        Parameters:
        workflow - the workflow to convert; must not be null
        Returns:
        the dataflow, which should not be modified.
        Throws:
        InvalidWorkflowException - If the compilation fails.

      • getDataflow

        public Dataflow getDataflow(WorkflowBundle bundle)
                     throws InvalidWorkflowException
        Description copied from interface: WorkflowCompiler
        Convert a workflow bundle into a dataflow. May cache. Only the the primary workflow is guaranteed to be converted.
        Specified by:
        getDataflow in interface WorkflowCompiler
        Parameters:
        bundle - the workflow bundle to convert; must not be null
        Returns:
        the dataflow, which should not be modified.
        Throws:
        InvalidWorkflowException - If the compilation fails.
